```{r message=FALSE}
#Loading Library
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# Reading file
hotelBookings <- read_csv(file="../../_data/hotel_bookings.csv") 

#Using required functions
hotelBookings %>%
  select(1:4) %>%
  filter(arrival_date_year==2015) %>%
  arrange(4)

hotelBookings %>%
  group_by(hotel) %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(adr), n = n())
```
